scripts.build-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c social-context.dna.workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm test
scripts.build-chunked-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c social-context.dna.workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-chunked
scripts.build-link-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c social-context.dna.workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-link
scripts.build-acai-test: cd ../../ && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && dna-util -c social-context.dna.workdir && cd zomes/tests && npm run test-acai
